catalog_info.title: Introduction to Still Photography
catalog_info.notes:
Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure. No previous studio experience necessary.
Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to still photography with an emphasis on the medium as a vehicle for expression and personal vision. Covers technical, historical, and aesthetic aspects of the medium. Class is organized around slide lectures, individual meetings, group critiques, and readings.
